mapper.update: update LAND_SECONDARY_STATISTICS set SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_NAME = #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SECONDARY_ID = #{secondaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECONDARY_IDENTIFIER = #{secondaryIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECONDARY_NAME = #{secondaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_COVERED = #{areaCovered,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PERCENTAGE = #{percentage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, SECONDARY_ID, SECONDARY_IDENTIFIER, SECONDARY_NAME, AREA_COVERED, PERCENTAGE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from LAND_SECONDARY_STATISTICS where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, SECONDARY_ID, SECONDARY_IDENTIFIER, SECONDARY_NAME, AREA_COVERED, PERCENTAGE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from LAND_SECONDARY_STATISTICS
